brief: Regulation 7: Do not feed the Concrete Gobbling Monster.
prompt: Dear all Ficsit Pioneers. R&D would like to advise you, that after a thorough investigation we can confirm that the mysterious Concrete Gobbling Monster is nothing but a rumor. In the event that you see the Concrete Gobbling Monster R&D would like to remind you that feeding imaginary monsters is not permitted.
message: Dear all Ficsit Pioneers. R&D would like to advise you, that after a thorough investigation we can confirm that the mysterious Concrete Gobbling Monster is nothing but a rumor.
